name: Pokémon Trader
text: Trade 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards in your hand for 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from your deck. Show both cards to your opponent. Shuffle your deck afterward.

effect.text: Trade 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards in your hand for 1 of the Basic Pokémon or Evolution cards from your deck. Show both cards to your opponent. Shuffle your deck afterward.

strengths: Search for any Pokemon in deck
weaknesses: Requires a Pokemon in hand to trade
counters: Lass - Shuffles Trader back into deck

competitiveHistory: Pokémon Trader was valuable for finding key Pokemon without card disadvantage, making evolution decks more consistent.

rulings.ruling: You must trade a Basic or Evolution Pokemon from your hand.
You can search for any Basic or Evolution Pokemon from your deck.
Both the traded Pokemon and the searched Pokemon must be revealed.
